content.rendered:
Visionaries Who Changed the World Series brings significant moments from the professional and personal lives of entrepreneurs who have had a deep impact on the business world. Their determination to meet their goals and the challenges they overcame to succeed, make their stories unique and inspirational.

One of the world’s richest people today, Bill Gates was so certain about setting up Microsoft as a young man that he decided to drop out of Harvard University to pursue his dreams, and the rest is history. Gates channelled his inherent rebellious streak into establishing a business empire. His adaptability and foresight in the constantly evolving world of technology has enabled him to grow his company and focus on philanthropic work.
